formalpara.title: Figure 3. Homologies among eIF4E isoforms
formalpara.para: Amino acid sequence alignments were performed using Vector NTI 9.0.0 with a gap penalty of 3.0 and a gap extension penalty of 0.1. Multiple sequence alignments were used to calculate protein distance values and construct a phylogenetic tree with PHYLIP software on the Institut Pasteur server. eIF4E isoforms from C. elegans are indicated in boxes. NCBI accession numbers are indicated. A. thaliana: At-1, Y10548; At-2, Y10547; At-3, AF028809. C. elegans: Ce-1, NM_067350; Ce-2, NM_075693; Ce-3, NM_171920; Ce-4, AF214651; Ce-5, NM_064207.
